title: Uni lecturers to march to President’s Office today (19)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Federation of University Teachers’ Associations (FUTA) has taken steps to launch a token strike On Tuesday (19) in all Universities to protest against the Government’s actions.

The Vice President of the Association, the Senior Lecturer at the Open University of Sri Lanka, Nadish de Silva stated that the University lecturers will be walking from the University of Colombo to the President’s Office on Tuesday (19) morning.
